item.title: B&B A la villa des Roses Voltaire
item.body: If you dream about calm and independence, this guest room will suit you perfectly. The landlords make a fully furnished studio duplex 65 m2 available for you. You are welcomed in French, Dutch and English for those who love green areas, the Josaphat Park is only a few steps away. Easy access from the motorway and the Zaventem airport.Twin room (3rd floor / stairs)- private bathroom and toilets- extra sofa bed- stays from 1 to 30 nights - no smoking - no pets.Situation : avenue Voltaire 1030 Bruxelles (Schaerbeek).Access : Trams : 7 - 56 (gare du Nord) 92 Bus : 59-69
